tha-ap25:7.2: dippati → dippeti (bj) | dibbati (mr), sāsanaṃ → jinasāsanaṃ (bj, pts1)
tha-ap25:12.3: Yaṃ desaṃ → yaṃ yaṃ desaṃ (s2, s3), upapajjāmi → upagacchāmi (bj)
tha-ap25:18.3: Hasakhiḍḍasamaṅgīhaṃ → hāsakhiḍḍāsamaṃgīnaṃ (bj) | sāyaṃ khiḍḍāsamaṅgīhaṃ (s2, s3) | sahassakhiḍḍasamaṅgīhaṃ (pts1)
tha-ap25:28.1: Sammā dhammaṃ bhāvetvāna → mamopamaṃ karitvāna (bj, s2, s3, pts1)
